channel.title: Monitoring Internet Browsing
channel.description: Hi all, I need a way (or if someone knows some software or extension to firefox or such) to monitor what my webbrowser does, or my whole inet connection, like if a form sends a POST to a server I see what it contains (I need to know this from a Flash Application) and stuff.

item.title: Monitoring Internet Browsing
item.dc:creator: @RsN RsN
item.description:
@RsN wrote:

Hi all, I need a way (or if someone knows some software or extension to firefox or such) to monitor what my webbrowser does, or my whole inet connection, like if a form sends a POST to a server I see what it contains (I need to know this from a Flash Application) and stuff.
